original_text: I will only live for a few more days. So leave me alone! Then I may be happy for a moment. I will only live for a few more days. So leave me alone! Then I may be happy for a moment. I will only live for a few more days. So leave me alone! Then I may be happy for a moment. I will only live for a few more days.
korean_text: 내 날은 적지 아니하니이까 그런즉 그치시고 나를 버려두사 잠시나마 평안하게 하시되

sentences.original_text: I will only live for a few more days.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 단지 며칠 더 살 뿐이다.

sentences.original_text: Then I may be happy for a moment.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 나는 잠시 동안 행복할 수 있을 것이다.
